text: The Special Representative of the Secretary-General for East Timor was appointed by the Secretary-General to lead the United Nations Transitional Administration in East Timor. During the transition from Indonesian rule to independence the United Nations appointed administrator fulfilled a role, which could be said to correspond in some ways to that of a head of state. ==List== {|class="wikitable" |- !Name ! Country |- |Sérgio Vieira de Mello | |- |Kamalesh Sharma | |- |Sukehiro Hasegawa | |- |Atul Khare | |- | Ameerah Haq | |- |Finn Reske-Nielsen (present) | |} ==See also== *Special Representative of the Secretary-General == References == Category:History of East Timor Category:United Nations operations in East Timor
title: Special Representative of the Secretary-General for East Timor
